name: Krabstadt - Arrabbiata wants a raise!
description:
Krabstadt - Arrabbiata wants a raise!

Arrabbiata is a volcano with Anger Management issues. After she reads about Rights of Nature, she decides to go into town and demand her long overdue raise.

Arrabbiata is the volcano in Krabstadt, a small town somewhere in the Arctic where the Nordic countries have sent their unwanteds. 

Navigate her anger as she burns through a gnarly post-social democratic reality
